data.comment: The match has started.
Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
In the minute 1, New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
New York City to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
New York City's Heber gets in a shot on goal at Red Bull Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 3, New York City have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a Chicago throw-in in New York City's half.
In the minute 4, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Robert Beric for Chicago drives towards goal at Red Bull Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Chicago have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Rubiel Vazquez signals a Chicago throw-in in New York City's half.
Fabian Herbers gets his shot on target but fails to score for Chicago.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
In the minute 8, New York City are pushing forward but Alexandru Mitrita's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Chicago at Red Bull Arena.
Free kick Chicago.
In the minute 11, Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Chicago.
Chicago to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
In the minute 12, Rubiel Vazquez signals a New York City throw-in in Chicago's half.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 16, Goal! Keaton Parks gives New York City a 1-0 lead.
Alexandru Mitrita with an assist there.
In the minute 18, Rubiel Vazquez awards New York City a goal kick.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
New York City drive upfield at Red Bull Arena and Maxime Chanot hits the bar with a header.
In the minute 20, Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
Chicago are whistled for offside.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Chicago.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Rubiel Vazquez awards New York City a goal kick.
In the minute 30, New York City to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
New York City drives forward and Heber gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for New York City at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 34, Free kick Chicago.
In Harrison, Chicago push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
In the minute 37, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
New York City have a goal kick.
New York City's James Sands has been booked in Harrison.
In the minute 38, Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
New York City's Jesus Medina misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
In the minute 42, Przemyslaw Frankowski for Chicago has been booked by Rubiel Vazquez and receives a first yellow card.
Rubiel Vazquez waits before resuming play because Ronald Matarrita for New York City is still down.
Ronald Matarrita is back on the pitch.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Robert Beric of Chicago smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
The first-half is over at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 45, Mauricio Pineda gets an equalizer for Chicago. The score is now 1-1.
Great play from Francisco Calvo to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Red Bull Arena.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a New York City throw-in in Chicago's half.
Ronny Deila is making the team's first substitution at Red Bull Arena with Maxi Moralez replacing Alexandru Mitrita.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Chicago.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Chicago.
Chicago are coming forward and Alvaro Medran gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for New York City at Red Bull Arena.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
New York City take a 2-1 lead thanks to Anton Tinnerholm.
Maxi Moralez with an assist there.
In the minute 55, New York City's Heber misses with an attempt on goal.
Chicago have a goal kick.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
In the minute 59, Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
In the minute 61, New York City to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
Free kick New York City.
Rubiel Vazquez awards Chicago a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Maxi Moralez (New York City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
In the minute 65, Heber (New York City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 66, Valentin Castellanos of New York City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Chicago at Red Bull Arena.
Valentin Castellanos is on a sub for Heber for New York City.
In the minute 67, New York City to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
Raphael Wicky (Chicago) is making a first substitution, with Elliot Collier replacing Robert Beric.
Przemyslaw Frankowski is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Przemyslaw Frankowski has recovered and rejoins the match in Harrison.
In the minute 69, New York City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chicago make their second substitution with Jonathan Bornstein replacing Fabian Herbers.
In the minute 72, Rubiel Vazquez signals a Chicago throw-in in New York City's half.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
New York City advance rapidly upfield but Rubiel Vazquez blows for offside.
In the minute 74, Can Chicago capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York City's half?
Goal! New York City extend their lead to 3-1 through Alexander Ring.
That's a fine assist from Anton Tinnerholm.
In the minute 77, New York City needs to be cautious. Chicago have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Chicago push forward at Red Bull Arena and Przemyslaw Frankowski gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined New York City defence.
In the minute 78, Free kick Chicago.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Chicago.
Gary Mackay Steven is replacing Jesus Medina for New York City at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 79, New York City make their fourth substitution with Gudmundur Thorarinsson replacing Ronald Matarrita.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Chicago.
In the minute 83, Alexander Callens (New York City) has received a yellow card from Rubiel Vazquez.
Chicago make their fifth substitution with Mike Azira replacing Boris Sekulic.
Brandt Bronico is on a sub for Alvaro Medran for Chicago.
In the minute 84, Raphael Wicky (Chicago) is making a fourth substitution, with Brian Gutierrez replacing Przemyslaw Frankowski.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ronny Deila is making the team's fifth substitution at Red Bull Arena with Nicolas Acevedo replacing James Sands.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Free kick New York City.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to New York City.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Harrison.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Corner awarded to New York City.
The match has come to a close in Harrison. The final score is 3-1.
Francisco Calvo (Chicago) has received a yellow card from Rubiel Vazquez.
